message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to find a price closer to my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate down to $100?

Hi Bob, I understand that $120 might be a bit out of your budget. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
